```{ojs}
years = [

  {deaths: 800, year: "'46"},

  {deaths: 250, year: "'50"},
  {deaths: 240, year: "'51"},
  {deaths: 250, year: "'52"},
  {deaths: 220, year: "'53"},
  {deaths: 80, year: "'54"}
]

Plot.plot({
  y: {domain: [0,3300], label: "deaths (%)"},
  x: {label: "year (1900+)"},

  marks: [
    Plot.barY(years, {y: "deaths", x: "year", fill: d => d.deaths}),
    Plot.ruleY([0])
  ]

})

```

:::{.aside}
It was not possible to "sense" the absence of nutrients bread.
This needed to be measured and changed in a controlled way.
